name: On the Fall of an Aeon

passive.name: Moth to Flames
passive.description: When the wearer attacks, increases their ATK by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> in this battle. This effect can stack up to {{2}} time(s). After the wearer breaks an enemy's Weakness, increases DMG dealt by <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{4}} turn(s).
